quote: I didn't know we had this many hills. The course designers must have found every single hill in the county.

Living just an hour away from Wausau for the past 20 years, I had no idea what diverse, challenging terrain lay just outside the city limits. The Ironbull Granite Grinder found those roads, and I will definitely be back to ride them again.
I brought a Camelback so I wouldn't need to stop at the aid stations
I did go to pick up my bib and packet...I also made a last minute stop to Rib Mountain Cycles to grab a pair of shoe covers in case the forecast of rain came true the next day.
Another awesome race. I am thoroughly impressed with all aspects of each race as both a racer and volunteer.
Food and an assortment of refreshments will await to celebrate the day's achievements in a lively, festival-like atmosphere
More than a dozen townships and municipalities
